name: canopy

canopy noun [C]
(COVER)

canopy noun [C]
(OF TREES)
the branches and leaves that spread out at the top of a group of trees forming a type of roof

canopy noun [C]

a cover like a roof for shelter or decoration, or the branches and leaves that spread out at the tops of trees in the woods: [ U ] Many animals live in the forest canopy.
